text: I'll have more on what happened to this child and what's happening in this #mogadishu hospital on @ac360 tonite at 8pm and at 10pm.
author: andersoncooper

text: The dead child's mother sat with his body for 2 hours. Her 2 other kids had already died. He was her last one. She had no money to bury him.
author: andersoncooper

text: Just got back from hospital in Mogadishu. A dead child lay on a bed. His parents sat silently by his side. There are no words.
author: andersoncooper

text: I know you've seen this before. I know it's an old story. But these little kids, they're dying before they've even had a chance.
author: andersoncooper

text: I apologize for the spelling mistakes. I haven't slept much in the past three days
author: andersoncooper

text: I wish you could visit this hospital in Mogadishu. I wish you could spend ten minutes with these kids, these moms. Nothing here is fair.
author: andersoncooper

text: I know you've seen this before. I know it's an old story.  But these little kids, their dying before they've even had a chance.
author: andersoncooper

text: Too few medical supplies in the hospital and too many malnurished kids. Their moms swat away the flies. There's little more they can do
author: andersoncooper

text: Just got back from hospital in Mogadishu. A dead child lay on a bed. His parents sat silently by his side. Their are no words.
